title: Failed: Permanent skin reroll
body:
Greetings,

I rerolled three skins so i could get a permanent one. I did get one for Darius but at that time i didn't owned him. 

After saving some IP i bought Darius but to my surprise i didn't own the skin after i bought this champion. Is this a bug of some sort?

Some explanation would be nice.

Kind regards

Gokjo

replies.body: Huh.....yea that's pretty weird. I saw all the confusion in your recent hextech crafting, and I'm really not sure what went wrong there. No worries. I've added Academy Darius back to your account for you ^_^!
